Question.Subject: If i bought my IMVU prepaid card at a self checkout will it be activated?
Question.Content: I'm thinking about buying an IMVU prepaid card, but i feel really gay buying it from a cashier. So I want to know if I buy it at a self checkout, will it be activated?
Question.ChosenAnswer: ...Wow. Anyways it should be activated. However I'm not sure...which is why you should do it the way you are sure to get the card and have it work. Cashier's see A LOT of things; I doubt they'll care about a prepaid card. XD

Answer.Content: ...Wow. Anyways it should be activated. However I'm not sure...which is why you should do it the way you are sure to get the card and have it work. Cashier's see A LOT of things; I doubt they'll care about a prepaid card. XD
